aboutMe.descriptionAbout: I am a front-end developer and I am a Unity Video Games Developer. I have a great passion for UI effects, animations, and creating intuitive and dynamic user experiences..

projects.title: winwheel Dinamic
projects.subTitle: Html, Css y Javascript
projects.descriptionCard: Dynamic Winwheel (non-responsive) created with Javascript, Css and Html5, This Game automatically adds the participants that are written in the text box, you can also change the game time with 3 simple buttons, at the end of the game the design it has clapping sound and a great confetti effect

projects.title: Personnel Entry Control Biopark Ukumary
